```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
#remove SE and CI purpose codes
lolo1 <- lolo1 %>% filter(!(PURPOSE_CODE %in% c("SE", "CI")))

#live trees, remove NA's
lolo1_live1 <- lolo1 %>% filter(!is.na(lolo1$HEIGHT) & lolo1$LIVE_DEAD=="L")

#calculate average ht per plot

lolo_ht <- lolo1_live1 %>% group_by(SETTING_ID, myear, PURPOSE_CODE, cluster) %>% summarize(av_ht = mean(HEIGHT)) %>% filter(SETTING_ID == "01160304010002")

ggplot(lolo_ht, aes(x = myear, y = av_ht, color = as.factor(cluster))) + geom_point() + geom_smooth()
```
